edu.usm.cos420.assignment1.dao.domain

Class CustomerDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.usm.cos420.assignment1.dao.domain.CustomerDao

  • public class CustomerDao
extends java.lang.Object
    A Data Access Object for Customer entities

    Uses JsonDao to persist Customer entities in JSON format

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomerDao()
      Default constructor creates an JSON file called customer.json

      Allows for a GenericDao of the correct type to be specified
      CustomerDao(java.lang.String fileName)
      Constructor allowing for the JSON file to be specified
